title: Beneficial Ownership Statement
description: A beneficial ownership statement is made up of an entity, an interested party (a reference to an entity, natural person, arrangement or trust), details of the interest and provenance information.

statementType.title: The type of statement. This should always be 'beneficialOwnershipStatement'
statementType.description: What is being described by this statement?

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: The subject of a beneficial ownership relationship.

interestedParty.title: Interested party
interestedParty.description: The interested party has some level of ownership or control over the entity referenced in this beneficial ownership statement.

interests.title: Interests
interests.description: A description of the interests held by the interestedParty covered by this statement in the entity covered by this statement.

source.title: Source
source.description: The source of the information that links the entity and the interested party, or that supports a null statement.
